==============================================

**ALSE - Test Equipment and Altimeters Tender**
==============================================

**Tender Reference Number:** cb-5745-88656761
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-23SL03/B
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** 2023-05-23
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-20T14:00:00

**Tender Status:** Expired
**Procurement Category:** SRVTGD
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Description:**
The Department of National Defence (DND), Directorate General Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM), invites bidders to submit proposals for the sustainment and delivery of Aviation Life Support Equipment (ALSE)/Search & Rescue – Aerial Delivery (SAR-AD) in-service support (ISS) and Repair and/or Overhaul (R&O) services for Test Equipment and Altimeters. The scope of work is described in Annex A - Performance Work Statement.

**Security Requirements:**
This tender has security requirements associated with it. Refer to Annex C - Security Requirement Check List and consult Part 6 - Security and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses for additional information.

**Basis of Payment:**
As per Annex B Basis of Payment, labour rates for subcontracting must not exceed the rates in effect under the Basis of Payment.

**Contact Information:**
Dany Lebel
Dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
(000) 000-0000

**Attachments:**
The tender documentation is available at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Note:**
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are encouraged to submit their proposals electronically using the epost Connect service instead of traditional methods.
